name: B.Y.O.O.L - Best Years Of Our Lives
name_original: B.Y.O.O.L - Best Years Of Our Lives
description:
A visual novel about love, full of odd humor, dark humor, meta humor and hopefully, heart. Join Nastya Byool as she goes on a dark, surreal adventure that will change her life forever. This kinetic novel will take you about 30-40 minutes to complete, making it a good way to pass the time if you're short on it. Gotta warn ya that it has swearing and somewhat dark jokes/plot developments so be careful if you're not comfortable with stuff like that. Though I do not think any of that is strong enough to require an adult tag.

You can play it either on android or you can emulate it on your PC, which is a totally valid way to play it in my opinion. You can peep the ost on my bandcamp soon-ish.
